text:
I am getting strange verify errors on some of the classes when I move them into 
a jar file into /WEB-INF/lib.

If I run Tomcat with the "-noverify" option my servlet works flawlessly. The 
same jars will verify fine outside the Tomcat environment.

Since the servlet works fine (without being packages into a Jar file) I think 
this is a bug...
creator: mpetres@netcom.ca
mpetres@netcom.ca
text:
OK,

I am answering my own post. This bug report was a false alarm. It turns out 
that the servlet was picking up stray classes, probably through the the system 
class path...
